treatment-md.title: Stigmatophora Staudinger and Pseudomiltochrista Dubatolov & Bucsek 1881
treatment-md.article-title: On the taxonomy of the genera Planovalvata Dubatolov & Kishida, Stigmatophora Staudinger and Pseudomiltochrista Dubatolov & Bucsek, with description of one new species (Lepidoptera, Erebidae, Arctiinae, Lithosiini)
